concept.shortdesc: The deprecated alt attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the alt element.

conbody.p: The altattribute is available on the image element; the attribute has been deprecated since DITA 1.0. The image element typically is used in topics, although the element also can appear as a child of ph in DITA maps.
